eventname: Connectivity redefined, cloud reimagined, telco reinvented
eventinfo: Network X is where the telecom and mobile industry’s foremost evangelists and futurists come together to spark powerful debates and connections. As the new home of the long-running and revered 5G World and Broadband World Forum, Network X introduces a new pillar to complete the picture: Telco Cloud. These three events combine to provide you with a truly universal view of the state of telco in 2022. But, the biggest part of this universe, is you, so get involved today.
